title: Artful Scaling of the Religion that is not a Religion - 4
description:
I am joined once again by Layman Pascal and Brendan Graham Dempsey as we push further into tackling the scaling problem  from symbols to ways of life. 

Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rAnLbaFHYWQ&t=1408s
Part2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VUz1uN8C_EM&t=1869s
Part3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4_a8_8iqoLQ&t=8s
